      • onYourTurn

        public void onYourTurn(boolean isMyTurn,
                       java.lang.String string,
                       int round,
                       int turn)
        Called on the player's turn.
        Parameters:
        isMyTurn - true if it's the player's turn, false otherwise.
        string - represents the reserve. If not null, the reserve is updated.
        round - indicates the current round.
        turn - indicates the current turn.

        public void onGameStarted(java.lang.Boolean windowChosen,
                          java.util.List<java.lang.String> names,
                          int turnTime)
        Called whenever the game starts.
        Parameters:
        windowChosen - true if the GUI owner has already chosen his window pattern card.
        names - is the list of players in the match.
        turnTime - is the time limit for each turn.

                           java.util.List<java.lang.String> rankingNames,
                           java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> rankingValues)
        Called when a multi player match ends.
        Parameters:
        winner - is the player with the highest score.
        rankingNames - is the ordered list of players by their scores.
        rankingValues - is the ordered list of the players'scores.

      • onGameEndSingle

        public void onGameEndSingle(int goal,
                            int points)
        Shows the player's score at the end of the game and the goal to beat, telling him if he won.
        Parameters:
        goal - is the score the player has to beat.
        points - is the player's actual score.

      • onAfterReconnection

        public void onAfterReconnection(java.lang.String toolcards,
                                java.lang.String publicCards,
                                java.util.List<java.lang.String> privateCards,
                                java.lang.String reserve,
                                java.lang.String roundTrack,
                                int myTokens,
                                java.lang.String[][] schemeCard,
                                java.lang.String schemeCardName,
                                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> otherTokens,
                                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[][]> otherSchemeCards,
                                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> otherSchemeCardNamesMap,
                                boolean schemeCardChosen,
                                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> toolcardsPrices)
        Called when a player is reconnected to a match. All his information about the game is updated.
        Parameters:
        toolcards - of the match.
        publicCards - of the match.
        privateCards - of the player.
        reserve - of the match at the current state.
        roundTrack - of the match at the current state.
        myTokens - are the token of the player.
        schemeCard - player's window pattern card.
        schemeCardName - name of the player's window pattern card.
        otherTokens - maps with opponents' names as key and their number of tokens as values.
        otherSchemeCards - maps with opponents' names as key and theur window pattern cards as values.
        otherSchemeCardNamesMap - maps with opponents' names as key and window pattern cards names as values.
        schemeCardChosen - is true if the reconnected player has already chosen his window pattern card, false otherwise.
        toolcardsPrices - map with tool card names as keys and their price as value.

      • onRoundTrack

        public void onRoundTrack(java.lang.String track)
        Updates the round track
        Parameters:
        track - is a string representing the round track.

      • onMyWindow

        public void onMyWindow(java.lang.String[][] window)
        Updates the GUI owner's window pattern card.
        Parameters:
        window - is a bi-dimensional array of strings representing the player's window pattern card.

      • onMyFavorTokens

        public void onMyFavorTokens(int value)
        Updates the number of favor tokens of the GUI owner.
        Parameters:
        value - is the new number of favor tokens.

      • onOtherFavorTokens

        public void onOtherFavorTokens(int value,
                               java.lang.String name)
        Updates the favor tokens of a player's opponent.
        Parameters:
        value - is the new number of favor tokens.
        name - is the opponent's name.

      • onOtherSchemeCards

        public void onOtherSchemeCards(java.lang.String[][] window,
                               java.lang.String name,
                               java.lang.String cardName)
        Called when one of the player's opponent modifies his window pattern card.
        Parameters:
        window - is the modified window pattern card.
        name - is the name of the opponent who modified his window pattern card.
        cardName - is the window pattern card name.

      • onOtherTurn

        public void onOtherTurn(java.lang.String name)
        Shows a message in the textArea of the game telling that is another's player's turn.
        Parameters:
        name - is the name of the player who is now playing.

      • onInitialization

        public void onInitialization(java.lang.String toolcards,
                             java.lang.String publicCards,
                             java.util.List<java.lang.String> privateCards,
                             java.util.List<java.lang.String> players)
        Initializes some game elements values.
        Parameters:
        toolcards - is a string representing the tool cards available for the match.
        publicCards - is a string representing the public objective cards available for the match.
        privateCards - is a list of the private objective cards available for the match.
        players - is the list of players in te match.

      • onPlayerExit

        public void onPlayerExit(java.lang.String name)
        Shows a message in the game board text area informing of the exit of a player.
        Parameters:
        name - of the player who left the match.

      • onWindowChoice

        public void onWindowChoice(java.util.List<java.lang.String> windows)
        Called when a player has to choose his window pattern card. If it's a single player match, both private objective cards available are shown. If it's a multi player match, only the first private objective card available is shown.
        Parameters:
        windows - is a list of the proposed window pattern cards.

      • onToolCardUsedByOthers

        public void onToolCardUsedByOthers(java.lang.String name,
                                   int toolNumber)
        Shows a message in the game board text area to inform that an opponent has used a tool card for the first time.
        Parameters:
        name - of the opponent who used the tool card for the first time.
        toolNumber - is the number of the used tool card.

      • onAfterWindowChoiceMultiplayer

        public void onAfterWindowChoiceMultiplayer()
        Called after the GUI owner has chosen his window pattern card in a multi player match. He is redirected to the game board scene and all the scene elements are initialized.

      • onAfterWindowChoiceSingleplayer

        public void onAfterWindowChoiceSingleplayer()
        Called after the GUI owner has chosen his window pattern card in a single player match. He is redirected to the game board scene and all the scene elements are initialized.

      • onChoosePrivateCard

        public void onChoosePrivateCard()
        Called at the end of a single player match, when the player has to choose which of the two private objective cards available he wants to use to calculate his final score.
